title: Following the Money in Congress: Meet the (New/Old/Same) Boss What to look for as 2008 approaches
description: This conference session focuses on money in politics as 2008 approaches, with new rules proposals, lobbying tactics, and contributions shaping up under the Democratic majorities. The session covers freshmen, new committee/sub-committee chairs, Democratic bundlers, and Republican challengers, and provides guidance on finding new donors and issues for new members and analyzing changes in donors for old members.
